mapper.insert: INSERT INTO employees (emp_no, birth_date, first_name, last_name, gender, hire_date) VALUES (#{employeeId}, #{birthDate}, #{firstName}, #{lastName}, #{gender}, #{hireDate})
mapper.update: UPDATE employees SET birth_date = #{birthDate}, first_name = #{firstName}, last_name = #{lastName}, gender = #{gender}, hire_date = #{hireDate} WHERE emp_no = #{employeeId}
mapper.select: SELECT emp_no, birth_date, first_name, last_name, gender, hire_date FROM employees
